about_the_game:
Confront an action horror experience where you take on the role of a resilient and trained survivor named Amy. Earth has been invaded by hostile extraterrestrial beings and it is up to you to navigate through dangerous environments, scavenging for supplies and fighting back against the intruders.

The alien encounters during your journey will heighten the sense of danger and fear, immersing you in a fight for your life. The visceral and graphic nature of the attacks adds an intense element to the game as you face off against ruthless invaders, the brutal combat serves as a reminder of the high stakes and the constant threat of death. The sight of realistic blood splatters and wounds leaking in real time add to the overall sense of urgency and danger as you are constantly reminded of the consequences of failure or rewards during combat. You will feel the impact of each blow and the fragility of the intruders as well as yourself.

The world has changed and has become a more foreboding and mysterious environment. The dim atmosphere creates a feeling of uneasiness with eerie sound design and unsettling visuals. Attempting to find useful items to stay alive but unsure of what is behind each corner will require you to have quick reflexes and precise aiming to take down the lurking threat.

The intruders are relentless in their pursuit, constantly searching for any remaining humans to eliminate. Is there anyone left? More importantly...

Can you survive?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence, gore, and partial nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0, Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Cold Blooded is a gripping third-person action survival horror game that lets players take the role of Amy, a determined and highly resourceful skilled fighter, who must battle for her life against an alien invasion taking over the planet.
